sql-statement.sql:
from wx_keyword where 1=1
<% if(!isEmpty(question)){ %> and question like #'%$question$%'# <% } %>
<% if(!isEmpty(questionkey)){ %> and questionkey like #'%$questionkey$%'# <% } %>
<% if(!isEmpty(answer)){ %> and answer like #'%$answer$%'# <% } %>

<% if(db_type == "mysql"){ %>
select * from wx_keyword order by ids asc limit ?, ?
<% } else if(db_type == "postgresql"){ %>
select * from wx_keyword order by ids asc limit ? offset ?
<% } else if(db_type == "oracle"){ %>
select * from ( select a.*, rownum rn from (select * from wx_keyword) a where rownum <= ? ) where rn >= ?
<% } %>
